data.comment: The match has started.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Paranaense a goal kick.
In the minute 1, Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Paranaense.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
In the minute 5, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Governador Magalhaes Pinto.
In the minute 6, In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Paranaense throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Throw-in Paranaense.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Atletico Mineiro's Keno gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Paranaense have a dangerous throw-in.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 13, Atletico Mineiro's Marrony gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Paranaense defender.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Atletico Mineiro needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Governador Magalhaes Pinto.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Hyoran (Atletico Mineiro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
Bueno (Atletico Mineiro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 19, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Governador Magalhaes Pinto.
Atletico Mineiro's Marrony misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 20, Paranaense have a goal kick.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 24, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Christian.
Paranaense's Christian is back in action after a slight knock.
Renato Kayzer for Paranaense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 25, Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in high up the field for Atletico Mineiro in Belo Horizonte.
Paranaense push upfield but Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 33, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal! Christian gives Paranaense a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 35, Great play from Fernando Canesin to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Paranaense.
Guilherme Arana gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 37, Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a throw-in for Atletico Mineiro, close to Paranaense's area.
In the minute 38, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Atletico Mineiro in Belo Horizonte.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Paranaense.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Paranaense.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Paranaense's half.
The first-half is over.
Goal! Paranaense extend their lead to 0-2 through Maycon Nikao.
In the minute 45, That's a fine assist from Renato Kayzer.
The second-half is underway at Governador Magalhaes Pinto.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a first substitution, with Calebe replacing Federico Zaracho.
Atletico Mineiro make their second substitution with Nathan replacing Hyoran.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Governador Magalhaes Pinto.
In the minute 48, In Belo Horizonte, Guilherme Arana of Atletico Mineiro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Paranaense's Maycon Nikao breaks free at Governador Magalhaes Pinto. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 50, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
In Belo Horizonte Paranaense attack through Richard. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Governador Magalhaes Pinto.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 61, Paranaense's Richard has been booked in Belo Horizonte.
Atletico Mineiro's Guilherme Arana gets in a shot on goal at Governador Magalhaes Pinto. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Keno for Atletico Mineiro has been booked by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 63, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
At Governador Magalhaes Pinto, Atletico Mineiro are penalized for being offside.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
In the minute 65, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paulo Autuori is making the team's first substitution at Governador Magalhaes Pinto with Wellington replacing Richard.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 68, Atletico Mineiro push forward at Governador Magalhaes Pinto and Eduardo Sasha gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Paranaense defence.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Governador Magalhaes Pinto.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Paranaense.
Dylan Borrero is replacing Marrony for Atletico Mineiro at Governador Magalhaes Pinto.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 75, Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Keno's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
The away team have replaced Fernando Canesin with Leo Cittadini. This is the second substitution made today by Paulo Autuori.
In the minute 77, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 78, Atletico Mineiro's Keno is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro just outside Paranaense's area.
In the minute 80, Atletico Mineiro drives forward and Keno gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Paranaense throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 82, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Keno of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Governador Magalhaes Pinto.
In the minute 83, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Paulo Autuori (Paranaense) is making a third substitution, with Ze Ivaldo replacing Maycon Nikao.
The away team replace Reinaldo with Fabinho.
In the minute 84, Bissoli is replacing Renato Kayzer for the away team.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Bissoli (Paranaense) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 88, Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 89, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
Atletico Mineiro have a dangerous throw-in.
Christian (Paranaense) has received a yellow card from Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's fourth substitution at Governador Magalhaes Pinto with Wesley replacing Talison Ruan Da Silva.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Paranaense.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
Bueno (Atletico Mineiro) has received a first yellow card.
